title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Master C fundamentals, from variables to functions, in this comprehensive 20-lesson course for coding proficiency.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore essential concepts for efficient problem-solving, building a strong foundation in computational thinking and skills.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Dive into C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms, mastering the essentials for coding success and efficiency.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Build a solid understanding of fundamental data structures, a must for every programmer's toolkit and problem-solving.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Delve into Python's Object-Oriented Programming for effective software development and advanced problem-solving techniques.

title: Software Engineering
description: Learn software engineering principles and practices for developing high-quality, reliable, and scalable software systems.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Explore AWS and cloud computing to harness the power of scalable, flexible, and cost-effective cloud solutions.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master MySQL database management, a vital skill for efficient data handling, storage, and retrieval in real-world applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance problem-solving skills, a key asset in the world of software development and computer science for successful career advancement.
